about_the_game:
Join the Discord to stay up-to-date with development progress and provide me with feedback!


Conquest of Kings condenses the depth of acclaimed strategy games into a thrilling 30-60 minute experience! Engage in online battles, ranging from intense 1v1s to epic 4-player free-for-alls, all vying for control over the coveted Sacred Sites. Control two Sites simultaneously to claim victory!

Recruit from five unit types and strategically position your armies. Seize economic tiles, issue commands, and unleash devastating cards to turn the tide of battle!


1. Preperation Phase:
  • Assign command tokens to all armies
2. Action Phase:
  • Address any Disrupt Commands
  • Execute Movement and Make Haste Commands
  • Complete Battles and play cards
3. Event Phase
  • Encounter random occurrences, including opportunities to donate to the Gods in exchange for their Favor
4. Recruitment Phase:
  • Players may spend gold to recruit new units at their keep


Units can unite on tiles to form powerful Armies, capable of conquering territories and engaging in battles against adversaries. Through strategic positioning and teamwork, these Armies become formidable forces, driving your conquest forward and securing victory on the battlefield.

  • Footman - Attack: 1 Defense: 1 Movement: 1 Cost: 1
  • Spearman - Attack: 1 Defense: 2 Movement: 1 Cost: 2
  • Swordsman - Attack: 2 Defense: 1 Movement: 1 Cost: 2
  • Horseman - Attack: 1 Defense: 1 Movement: 2 Cost: 2
  • Knight - Attack: 2 Defense: 1 Movement: 2 Cost: 3



Maps consist of tiles, with capturing Sacred Sites essential for victory. Farms and Mines offer economic bonuses crucial for success. Consider terrain during battles, as certain tiles grant advantages to attackers or defenders.




At the beginning of every round, each Army requires a Command to guide its actions. These Commands provide direction to your forces and are resolved one at a time. For instance, if you issue two "Movement" commands, you can opt to execute one on your initial turn and the second on the following turn. This strategic approach allows for careful planning and execution of maneuvers throughout the game.

  • Movement - Command this army to move or attack. Units can move to seperate tiles.
  • Fortify - The Army on this tile gains +1 Defense.
  • Support - This Army will support combat in adjacent tiles (attacks or defense). You can support battles between other players.
  • Prepare - This Army gains +1 Attack next turn. But -1 Defense this turn.
  • Disrupt - Remove an adjacent enemy "Support", "Fortify", "Prepare", "Make Haste" or "Distrupt" command or steal and enemy's econ tile's yield for this round.
  • Make Haste - Units on this tile gain +1 movement but cannot attack and have 0 defense after movement. Units must also "recover" next turn, meaning they cannot move.



Play cards from your hand to sway the outcome of battles. Whether it's bolstering attacks, fortifying defenses, or unleashing game-changing effects, the power is in your hands. But remember, each card played is discarded until your hand is depleted, so choose your moves wisely to maximize their impact. Once your hand is empty, you'll have the opportunity to replenish it and continue the fight!



The Gods favor those who honor them and may penalize those who disregard their influence. When making offerings to the Gods, weigh your options carefully. Consider the bonuses you seek and the penalties you can bear. With gold being a finite resource, it's essential to choose your tributes wisely, ensuring optimal outcomes for your endeavors. Additionally, keep in mind that your opponents may offer differing amounts of gold in tribute, further complicating your decisions. Remember, the Gods favor those who offer the most!

  • Aurius the God of Authority - Tributes to Aurius dictate the turn order, with higher tributes securing a superior position in the sequence.
  • Ravagos the God of War - Tributes to Ravagos grant combat bonuses to players, and favor also decides battle tiebreakers.
  • Luxar the God of Prosperity - Tributes to Luxar provide players with additional gold each round.
  • Savarin the God of Bounty - Tributes to Savarin provide players with additional supply, enabling them to field larger armies.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E4300 (2 * 1800) / AMD Athlon Dual Core 4450e (2 * 2300) or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 8800 GTX (768 MB) / Intel HD 4600 / Radeon HD 3850 (512 MB)
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Dive into fast-paced, deep-level turn-based strategy! Compete for Sacred Sites, recruit units, play powerful cards, conquer strategic tiles, and forge alliances with cunning diplomacy... only to shatter them when necessary - for in this realm, only one can claim the throne!
